entities.name: grindelvald
entities.description: Grindelvald is mentioned as a dark wizard who was defeated by Dumbledore. He is also referred to as Grindelwald.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who defeated Grindelvald and is feared by him.

relationships.description: Grindelvald was defeated by Dumbledore, as mentioned in the text.
Krum implies that Xenophilius is a supporter of Grindelvald by pointing out his symbol.
Krum glared menacingly at Xenophilius, implying that he is upset with him.
